app.name: Pinpo
app.short_description: Pinpo automates lead qualification for medium and large-sized B2C companies.
app.long_description:
Pinpo boosts companiesâ€™ sales conversion rates with a SaaS that automates and simplifies lead qualification.
Pinpo relies on their robust AI-powered sales assistant and a community of 70+ experts to engage leads over natural SMS conversations, qualify them, and identify the ones that are ready to buy. With Pinpo, companies are able to decrease their customer acquisition cost.
Pinpo's solution caters to many different industries including real estate, banking, insurance, automobile, and more.
app.installation_instructions: You can book a demo with our team [here](https://www.pinpo.fr/demoContact) or contact us directly by [email](mailto:contact@pinpo.fr)
